title: XANTHI Political Intervention of the KKE (M-L)
content:
Intervention in the central square of the city was organized by the KKE (M-L) on Saturday, March 23, with announcements by the telecoon and a proclamation. The anti -populist policy of the government and the system was overall, and the path of organized struggle was promoted. The response of the world was quite positive, which has been found in other interventions lately. There are clear indications of the depth and breadth of the attack that touches wide social strata and the concerns and pursuits that develop within these strata.


Following is the notice shared:

To live we have to fight !!

Thus participating in the crime of Zionists and the US, who massively slaughtered by the Palestinian people, condemn the death of thousands of children, carry out a Nazi genocide and have turned the Gaza Strip into a "skull place" !!

The reality boats !! To live we have to fight.

Through the unions that have to be made of struggle organs of workers and not seals in the hands of sold union leaders. With assemblies and strikes Determined to fight and earn collective agreements and substantial salaries, rights, trade union freedoms.

Through race committees and initiatives, who will rally people and youth to develop resistance and claims, for free care and education, for cheap energy and the goods of popular need for safe and cheap transport.

The massive student of the students, that was closed by the KKE forces at universities and other supposedly left-wing factions to focus on the European elections coming, left indelible his stamp on youth consciences, but also in wider layers. So are the agricultural mobilizations. The mass strike on 28 February showed that there is enough anger, possibility, and a need to open the road of the race !! For a front of resistance and claim, for work, education, peace, life with rights.
